markdownRemark.html:
I created a button style with some fancy effects. It only depends on HTML + CSS. It shows the power of CSS transform and transition properties. However the CSS code is somehow redundant and prolix. I am going to learn a CSS preprocessor like SCSS to improve efficiency.

Ghost Button

See the Pen Ghost Button by loconomo (@dontry018) on CodePen.

prev.html: Today I tried to figure out how to use some pretty icon to show my contact at footer. Then I found Font-awesome. It has a vast variety of useful website icons which is designed for Bootstrap. It is controlled by CSS that can create many amazing effects. It satifies all I need and make my site look nicer.
